# IKResource

**Class**

A reference counted immutable resource which contains one or more inverse kinematics solver rigs.

## Declaration

```swift
class IKResource
```

## Overview

Use this resource with an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKComponent].

## Initializers

- **init(rig:)**: Creates a new resource instance for a single solver using the given rig and an automatic solver identifier.

## Instance Properties

- **solverDefinitions**: Getter for the deserialized resource contents as a collection of solver definitions.

## Inverse kinematics components

- **IKComponent**: A component that allows you to procedurally animate a skeletal model using a full body inverse kinematics solver.
- **IKComponent.Joint**: The update stage object that lets you read and update the current settings of a single joint in an IK solver.
- **IKComponent.JointCollection**: Ordered dictionary like container with fixed size.
- **IKComponent.Solver**: The update stage object that lets you read and update the current settings of a single solver instance.
- **IKComponent.SolverCollection**: Ordered dictionary like container with fixed size.
- **IKComponent.Constraint**: The update stage object that lets you read and update the current settings of a single constraint in an IK solver.
- **IKComponent.ConstraintCollection**: Ordered dictionary like container with fixed size.
- **IKSolverDefinition**: A container describing a solver instance.

## Conforms To

- Resource
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
